summary: Comprehensive research on ~/.claude/ directory cleanup. Found projects/ is 97% of 7.3GB total. Current /refresh only cleans current project. Recommend adding --global mode with tiered age thresholds (8h/2d/all) to clean debug, file-history, todos, session-env, plugins, telemetry directories.

artifacts.summary: Research report covering directory structure analysis, web research on community cleanup tools, safety considerations, and implementation recommendations for global cleanup mode
